title: go/printer: odd // alignment in const block
body:
godoc is aligning the // and the =, which is a bit surprising.
it's fine to leave as is if there is some fundamental reason or if changing it just
breaks too much.

const (
	_          ExprOp = iota
	Add               // Left + Right
	AddEq             // Left += Right
	Addr              // &Left
	And               // Left & Right
)
